select wri.id, wri.user_id, wri.water_amount, wri.sport_amount, wri.sport_name, wri.sport_time, wri.weight, wri.content, wri.create_date, ui.name as userName, ui.code as userCode, ui.images as userImages from weight_record_info wri left join user_info ui on (ui.id = wri.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{weightRecordInfo.userName},'%')
AND wri.sport_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{weightRecordInfo.sportName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{weightRecordInfo.userId}
order by wri.create_date desc
